# Introduction

The goal of this package is to produce both PDF and HTML output with similar styles from the same R Markdown document.

# References

References can be displayed as margin notes for HTML output. For example, we can cite R here [@R-base].

```{r bib, include=FALSE}
# create a bib file for the R packages used in this document
knitr::write_bib('base', file = 'skeleton.bib')
```
